session_info.name: FRXBA - Invited Oral Presentation, Beam Instrumentation and Feedback

papers.title: Beam Halo Characterization and Mitigation
authors: Beam halo is a serious issue in many machines
such as high intensity linacs and synchrotrons. This presentation reviews recent advances in halo characterization techniques
as well as methods to mitigate beam halo
such as collimation with associated handling of created secondary particles.
